docs.abstract: Michael Beschloss Historysource column recalls how Pres Richard Nixon's 1972 Committee to Re-elect the President, which helped promote Nixon at Republican National Convention, initiated tradition of using slick political and advertising techniques to sell nominees at political party conventions.
